title: Spacious 4 bedroom Apartment near Fort Washington Park
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 268805684', 'Rent: $3,850 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1.5', 'Available Date: 07/28/2022', '4 BR w/Dining room/ 5 BR Flex with 1.5 Bath W 177, Fort Washington, Elevator/Laundry & Live in Super', 'W 177 & Fort Washington / Huge 7 room pre-war apartment', 'This gem is almost an original layout.', 'It features:', 'Hardwood floor', 'High ceilings', 'Plenty of rooms', 'Washer/Dryer in Unit', 'Living room', 'Dining room', 'Separate kitchen', 'Full common bathroom', 'One water closet', 'One powder vanity between bedrooms one & two', 'Plenty of French doors in the common areas', 'Kitchen features white appliances and a good amount of cabinet space', 'Areas of Interest: Express A Train, Inwood Hill Park, The Cloisters, Columbia University Baker’s Athletics Complex, Broadway, Dyckman Street', 'Hudson Heights charms its residents with its stretches of green space.', 'Fort Tryon gardens offer an escape from the rush of Manhattan and breathtaking views of the Hudson River.', 'The Uptown Art Stroll brings a variety of exciting art events to the neighborhood throughout the summer.', 'A budding restaurant scene has emerged over the past few years, making for easy night out.', 'The Express A train makes any commute a breeze, reaching Midtown in just 20 minutes.']
